xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 10 Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika » 10.7 Pañhāvāra » 10.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
115.
1420Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare sattarasa, samanantare sattarasa, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe ekādasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, purejāte pañca, pacchājāte pañca, āsevane sattarasa, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte ekādasa, vippayutte nava, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā sattarasa, vigate sattarasa, avigate sattarasa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1421Paccanīyānulomaṃ.
Pañhāvāro.
1422Dassanenapahātabbahetukattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 10.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānulomaup11 Ācayagāmittika >>
